      public void updateId()
       Description:  Updates the id by generating a new matrix and, therefore, a new code.
 Pos:  matrixId int[] Each position will be filled with a random value
 Pos:  id String Will be changed or initialized to the new generated id.

    • generateRandomMatrix

      public int[][] generateRandomMatrix(int size)
       Description:  Fill the 6x6 matrix with random numbers between 0-9
 Pre:  matrixId int[] Must be initialized with random values
 Pos:  matrixId int[] Each position will be filled with a random value
      Parameters:
      size - int The size of the new matrix
      Returns:
      matrix int[][] The new random matrix

    • calculateId

      public String calculateId()
       Description:  It calculates the unique id of the playlist based on a pattern in the matrix.
 For Only songs it is an N, Only Podcasts is a T, and AllAudios is the odd sums of rows and columns greater than 1
 Pre:  matrixId int[] Must be initialized and filled with random values
 Pos:  id String Will be updated with the new calculated value
      Returns:
      newId String The new id for the playlist

    • showMatrixId

      public String showMatrixId(int[][] matrix)
       Description:  It prints the matrix that generated the playlist identifier
 pre:  matrixId int[] Must be initialized
      Parameters:
      matrix - int[][] the matrix to print
      Returns:
      matrixStr String a readable version of the matrix

    • addAudio

      public boolean addAudio(Audio newAudio)
       Description:  It adds a new audio to the playlist's audios collection, ensuring that it is not already in it.
 pre: audios ArrayList must be initialized
      Parameters:
      newAudio - Audio the audio that is going to be added to the list
      Returns:
      status boolean it will be false if the audio is already in the list

    • removeAudio

      public boolean removeAudio(Audio tmpAudio)
       Description:  It removes an existing audio from the playlist's audios collection, ensuring that it is inside it.
 pre: audios ArrayList must be initialized
      Parameters:
      tmpAudio - Audio the audio that is going to be removed from the list
      Returns:
      status boolean it is false if the audio is not in the playlist

      public Audio searchAudio(Audio newAudio)

 pre: audios ArrayList must be initialized
      Parameters:
      newAudio - Audio The audio to be compared with each in the list
      Returns:
